description: A look at people whose health problems caused serious financial stress.
title: The Weight of Medical Bills
title_page: The Weight of Medical Bills - The New York Times
maintext:
Slide 1 of 7,
Janis Maney, 63, of Pensacola, Fla., with her dog, Alex. Ms. Maney is awaiting word on whether her application for financial aid to pay the remaining $750 balance on her gallbladder surgery will be approved.
“I did not have health insurance when I was diagnosed with colorectal cancer in 2006. I paid some of the bills, but I quickly ran out of money.”
